programme.title: State of the Culture

programme.title: State of the Culture
programme.desc: Joe Budden, Remy Ma, Jinx, and Eboni K Williams discuss the routines we want to retain from the quarantine, Tory Lanez getting suspended from IG Live, a review of Kiana Ledé's new album, COVID-19's dire effect on the black community, and more. Also: Goin' Left Real Quick returns with Jinx in the hot seat. | Kijkwijzer: All ages.

programme.title: State of the Culture
programme.desc: In this virtual episode, Joe Budden, Remy Ma, Jinx, & Eboni K. Williams discuss Ja Rule challenging 50 Cent, the Teddy Riley & Babyface battle, ESPN's Michael Jordan mini-series, and more. Also, Goin' Left Real Quick with Eboni in the hot seat.

programme.title: State of the Culture
programme.desc: Joe Budden, Remy Ma, Jinx, & Eboni K Williams discuss businesses opening up again in Georgia, losing Fred the Godson, the potential Dr. Dre & Puff Verzuz battle, and more. Featuring special guest Vice President-Elect Kamala Harris.
